thread.section_title: Firmoo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Firmoo | www.firmoo.com | 3 of 13
thread.title: Lindsay Corson

author: Lindsay Corson
title: Lindsay Corson
text: i ordered 3 pairs of prescription glasses from firmoo on january 09th 2017.. they arrived at my door step via UPS on january 18th.. all 3 pairs came in a nice case with a cleaning cloth for each. all 3 also came with 3 draw string pouches to put the cases in, very nice quality so really i got 2 cases for each. each pair also came with a repair kit including a screw driver and extra screws. one pair came with extra nose pads. i paid 40$ total for all 3 pairs including shipping! i got the cheapest regular shipping too and it was fast.. i had 2 transactions w coupons i got 1st pair free plus shipping for joining firmoo and 2nd order i bought 1 pair and got 1 free plus shipping.but both orders came in same package and same arrival date which i appreciated.. amazing deals! look for coupons... tracking info was easy to understand and accurate.. the longest wait was waiting for the lenses and making the glasses, once they shipped them out from china it only took 2 days! amazing.. THANKS SO MUCH. 1st time buying from firmoo and i will be back for more.
